mapper.select: select customer_id, visit_times, call_times, msg_times, wx_times from se_communication where se_communication.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into se_communication_log (id, communication_id, communication_way, communication_content, communication_time) values(#{id}, #{communicationId}, #{communicationWay}, #{communicationContent}, #{communicationTime})
mapper.update: update se_communication_log set communication_id = #{communicationId}, communication_way = #{communicationWay}, communication_content = #{communicationContent}, communication_time = #{communicationTime} where id = #{id}
